remarks: The set of neighbors of an element of the first component of an ordered pair, especially of a vertex in a graph.  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens and Mario Carneiro, 9-Oct-2017.)
statement: nbgrael $p |- ( ( V e. X /\ E e. Y ) -> ( N e. ( <. V , E >. Neighbors K ) <-> ( K e. V /\ N e. V /\ { K , N } e. ran E ) ) ) $.
